phrs.translation: 女性气质, 女性特征女子本性, 女人味, 温柔

sentences.sentence: To me masculinity is all my perception, and I think masculinity and feminity is very old-fashioned.
sentences.translation: 但我认为探讨男性化还是女性化已经过时了。

sentences.sentence: Post feminists theories are employed in this paper for finding the new definition and status of"feminity".
sentences.translation: 本论文通过论述后女性主义的理论，探索“女性”的定义和女性形象的再定位。

sentences.sentence: As a female, i think fine education, elegant appearance and a heart with mercy is very important. also romantic and loyal to feelings, feminity but no flabby.
sentences.translation: 作为一个女性，我觉得良好的教养，端庄的仪表，善良的内心，浪漫又忠于情感和温柔而不软弱的性格是很重要的。
